request.description:
Verify OTP code sent to phone number

✅ TESTED & WORKING (Dec 2, 2025)

Requirements:
• Use the SAME phone format as Send OTP
• 6-digit code must match exactly
• Must be verified within 5 minutes
• Type must match the Send OTP request

Success Response:
• verified: true
• tempToken: Temporary token for registration (valid 10 minutes)
• tempTokenExpiry: Token expiration time

Use the tempToken to complete registration with /api/auth/set-password endpoint.
